data.author: Hans Quick

changelog.release_notes: Fixed bug: history data was not cleared at midnight.
Fixed display issue in weekly activity and weekly sleep chart. (Only Applite)

Store snapshot values (every 15 minutes) of steps, walking and biking in persistent memory. This allow to sync the progress of your fitness data over the day, at the end of day. No bluetooth permanent connection is neccessary to get the values for the complete day.

To gain more free memory for the app, the menu on the watch is reduced. All items which are available from the settings menu on the mobile are removed.
Added new Parameter (Sensitivity for step recognition algorithm) Added new Config Page (Clay)
First Release with the Android companion App.

Support for the android widget (companion app).
Gives now a hint when starting biking calibration. (Calibration in progress. Please start biking and do not release the handle bar until complete.)
Setup option for a unique pebble ID. In the case you have several Pebbles to sync with your mobile.
Some improvements in sleep recognition. Notify background when changing sleep mode or sleep time. Sync: Submitting atomic config values instead of C-Struct. Fixed display of weekly step and sleep data, when outside of 31-day window

Fixed end of sleep recognition in static sleep mode.
Preparation for companion app. 
Fixed displaying wrong state of "biking enabled" flag in setup.
Fixed a crash and wrong display of data caused by the 29. February

BugFix for displaying step and sleep data in february
Some improvements in battery saving
Improvemens in sleep recognition

Fixed displaying of activity / sleep across end of year.
New setup parameter. Let you specifiy on which conditions watchapp should popup automatically.
Workaround for sleep recognition on different firmware / watch models.
Prepared for synchronization with companion app.
Some minor bugfixes and code improvements.

Eliminate possible crash condition during sleep detection.
Fixed errors in sleep detection/calculation.
Fixed synchronisation issues between background worker and foreground app.
Fixed minor display issues.

Improved step recognition on Pebble Time.
Fixed bug: Resets sleeping period immediately when start sleep is after midnight.
Minor bugfixes.
Replaces accidantly published previous version. Includes enabling/disabling of biking recognition. Colored images for the Pebble Time Some bugfixes.

- Check for battery charging and suspend sleeping detection. 
- Display version information in watchapp menu.

data.description:
An optional companion app (android) is published now. Link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.doublequick.hans.QuickFit

- Step recognition
- Sleep and deep sleep recognition
- 3 Modes for sleep window. Automatic, static (fixed times in the setup), Manual (Start and stop on the watch)
- Recognition for Riding your bicycle (Calibration is required)

Steps, Time of bike riding, Sleep and deep sleep are saved for 31 days on the watch.

Currently 2 diagrams shows the weekly progress of the above data.

And of course included is DITO. Depending on the daily Count of steps / Bike riding or your sleep Quality he will show his feelings like a tamagochi.
So make him happy and cause him to jump, if you reached the desired Goal.

All Settings can be done directly on the watch. There is also the possibility to do the configuration from the mobile.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed bug: history data was not cleared at midnight.

data.title: QuickFit - Fitness and Sleep Tracker
